general.description: Zalebus is a nice planet that was terraformed by the Soromid shortly before the Incident. It was a borderline class M to begin with, so the process was one of the fastest in human history. Now, there are billions of people living here.
general.bar: The age demographic of Zalebus tends toward younger citizens. As a result, the spaceport bar is often full of youngsters preparing for a trip into space, or just returning from one.
